column4: I have spent the last 4 hours trying to make me owner of a partition and it still says root is the owner. anyone able to help me?
have you tried   sudo chown myusername:myusername /path/to/mountpoint/of/the/filesystem -R     ?

- thank you (n I can start teh copying of file to make room and tehn got to bed now!!!) I was telling it to change permitions on the sdb5 location not the mount point- as soon as i did that the window refreshed and i now can create foldrs
